title: Sweet Feast Of Love Divine
presentation: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

v1: To feed upon this bread and wine,
v2: Waits, Lord, from Thee to learn
The secrets of Thy Father's breast,
v3: The sweetness of the Bread of Life,
v4: That blood that flowed for sin
And feel the blessed pledge within
That we are loved of Thee.
v5: But if this glimpse of love
What will it be, O Lord, above,
v6: To see Thee face to face,
And all Thy ways of wondrous grace
